modName: The Desert of Sherrad in Sungarde
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]a91r5FcE81w[/youtube]

This mod requires Dragonborn DLC.

This mod requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22388/?]Sungarde 2.3[/url]

It is actually Sungarde version 2.4, which features a desert/savannah landscape area, bigger than the other ones. It just got so different from the original mod that I decided to make a separate release.

There is no scripted quest, this is a project I had abandoned about 1 year ago due to the poor recognition of Sungarde, but now I decided to release what is playable.

***********************************************************************
FEATURES
***********************************************************************

 -The desert of Sherrad, a landmass of circa 15 x 20 quads + 2 small landmasses (Bridge of Kings and Hashashin Bay)
 
The Sherrad is a complex network of canyons and small valleys, and most of the area is unaccessible because of the rocky slopes. If you feel lost sometimes, look for the skull torches: they will point you the way in critical spots. There are friendly NPC´s at the following places: naturalist´s camp, refugee camp and the Ayleid excavation site. Some of them have dialogue, and will provide information about the area.
 
 - 16 new dungeon cells: 9 nordic ruins, 3 caves, 3 dwemer, 1 mine.

 - 3 Ayleid ruins (exteriors only).

 - Zebra and camel mounts.

 - new meshes, new creatures,lots and lots of eyecandy.

***********************************************************************
CHANGELOG
***********************************************************************

V. 1.1:

 -Added a new bandit faction (Touaregs)

 -Added 2 new dungeons and expanded Sherrad

 -Fixed several small glitches such as clipping, cracks, misplaced objets and floating rocks.

  
***********************************************************************
Installation
***********************************************************************

_Extract the "data" folder to your "The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim" folder.

-Add a check to Sungarde.esp in the game start  menu... and play!

***********************************************************************
Location
***********************************************************************

  The portal to Sungarde is located in the north. I added a screenshot showing where. Once you get to bonebreaker valley, there will be another portal to Sherrad nearby.

***********************************************************************
Known bugs/issues
***********************************************************************
  
- The camel is buggy. Its glimpse has an annoying glitch and when you mount it, the distance character/ground is mismatched(We are still waiting for the author to fix this).

***********************************************************************
  
CREDITS
***********************************************************************
All the stuff listed in the credits of Sungarde plus new meshes from:

BARDISPOON- Spiffy skeever

EDHILDIL- camel

GG77- Gazelle

JENNYFUR69- Egyptian khopesh 

OARYSTIS- Witcher meshes

MUPPETMUPPET- Rocks and ground textures

TAMIRA- Lots of her stuff 

VARLAISARAN- Ayleid ruins

WITCHER5688- Witcher meshes  

WOLF OF THE AZAR- Anubite armor 

and some stuff of mine of course.
author: Leodoidao
